title: Captain Hook

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Host a raid party at another player's house, kidnapping a random visitor.
- For 1 Malice, interrogate another player, revealing their will to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Kidnapping a visitor will remove them from the game until tomorrow.
Your target will be notified that they have been interrogated.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- You will now kidnap all visitors and kill one random visitor.
- You will instead send one of your pirates to interrogate the target, making it astral.

desc:
Post 5424
*"Double the powder and shorten the fuse!"*
